mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def extract_email_domains(paragraph):
    email_regex = ''
    email_addresses = re.findall(email_regex, paragraph)
    domain_names = [email.split('@')[1].lower() for email in email_addresses]
    domain_counts = Counter(domain_names)
    sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_domains

mutants.original_line: sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
mutants.mutated_line: sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def extract_email_domains(paragraph):
    email_regex = '[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+'
    email_addresses = re.findall(email_regex, paragraph)
    domain_names = [email.split('@')[1].lower() for email in email_addresses]
    domain_counts = Counter(domain_names)
    sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)
    return sorted_domains

import re
from collections import Counter

def extract_email_domains(paragraph):
    email_regex = '[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+'
    email_addresses = re.findall(email_regex, paragraph)
    domain_names = [email.split('@')[2].lower() for email in email_addresses]
    domain_counts = Counter(domain_names)
    sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_domains

import re
from collections import Counter

def extract_email_domains(paragraph):
    email_regex = '[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+'
    email_addresses = re.findall(email_regex, paragraph)
    domain_names = [email.split('@')[1].lower() for email in email_addresses]
    domain_counts = Counter(domain_names)
    sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_domains

import re
from collections import Counter

def extract_email_domains(paragraph):
    email_regex = '[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+'
    email_addresses = re.findall(email_regex, paragraph)
    domain_names = [email.split('')[1].lower() for email in email_addresses]
    domain_counts = Counter(domain_names)
    sorted_domains = sorted(domain_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_domains
